TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
CREATURE_TRIGGER: deals combat damage to a player
ACTIVATED_EFFECT: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Create a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token.

W: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield, if you gained life this turn, draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Whenever another creature you control becomes tapped, if this is the first time this ability resolved this turn, you may draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may draw a card. If you do, that player gains 2 life.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control blocks, you may draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a creature you control with vigilance attacks, scry 1, then you may draw a card.
Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, if you drew a card this turn, draw a card.
Whenever one or more creatures you control are returned to your hand from the battlefield, draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets exactly one creature you control, draw a card.
Whenever an effect you control prevents damage, draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life.
U: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If you do, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, untap up to one target creature you control.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1, then you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, if it wasn't declared as an attacker, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you discard a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you draw your third card in a turn, create a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token.
Whenever an opponent scry s, you may draw a card. If you do, put a card from your hand on top of your library.
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, if that creature has flying, draw a card.
Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, each opponent mills one card.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell that shares a card type with another spell you cast this turn, draw a card.
Whenever one or more creatures you control become blocked, you may draw a card for each creature that became blocked this combat, then discard that many cards.
Whenever a permanent you control phases in, draw a card.
B: Whenever you draw a card, you lose 1 life and each opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {1} life. If you do, draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you lost 3 or more life this turn, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may draw a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target opponent mills two cards and you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if you drew a card this turn, draw a card.
Whenever a card leaves your graveyard, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. If you do, draw a card, then lose 1 life.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value {X} or less from your graveyard, draw a card.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it wasn't sacrificed, you may draw a card.
Whenever you sacrifice another creature, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn and you drew a card this turn, each opponent loses 2 life and you draw a card.
Whenever a token you control dies, you may draw a card.
Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, you may surveil 1. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you draw a card while you have ten or more cards in your graveyard, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you exile a card from a graveyard, you may draw a card and lose 1 life.
R: Whenever you discard a card, this creature deals 1 damage to any target and you may draw a card.
At the beginning of your end step, if you drew three or more cards this turn, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card, then draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, draw a card.
Whenever a spell or ability you control deals noncombat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. When you do, if you cast it, draw a card.
Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. If you cast it, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a source you control, if it's the second time this turn a source you control dealt damage to that player, draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control with haste attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand, graveyard, or library, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent and you may draw a card.
Whenever a spell you control is copied, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value greater than the number of cards in your hand, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, you may draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw a card with mana value {X} or greater, this creature gets +{X}/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with haste.
Whenever one or more creatures you control die, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. If you cast a spell this way, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets only this creature, draw a card.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you haven't drawn a card this turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
G: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature you control with power 4 or greater entered the battlefield this turn, draw a card.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1, then you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, if its mana value is greater than the number of cards in your hand, draw a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with power 2 or less.
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on a creature you control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Whenever a creature you control fights or becomes blocked, draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, if you cast a creature spell this turn, draw a card.
Whenever you draw a creature card, you gain 1 life.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value {X} or greater, create a 1/1 green Beast creature token and draw a card.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature or land, draw a card.
Whenever a land you control becomes tapped for mana, if it's the second time this turn a land with that name produced mana, you may draw a card.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you draw a card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if you drew a card and gained life this turn, draw an additional card.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
C: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more artifacts, draw a card.
Whenever a colorless spell you control resolves, scry 1, then draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value {X} or greater, if that spell is colorless, draw a card.
Whenever a noncreature, nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and on up to one other target artifact creature you control.
Whenever a land you control becomes tapped for {C}, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
